title: The Disenchanted Soldier
description: In 1863, young Daniel Adin, a trained soldier, embarks on an adventure of a lifetime. In pursuit of a new life and land to farm he travels to New Zealand to fight an unknown enemy – the fearless Maori. A hundred and thirty years later, Libby was fascinated by the stories of Daniel who looked down at her from the aged black and white photos on the walls. She wanted to know more: to know what he was really like. Daniel’s story was more than she had bargained for. Retitled from Daniel.
author: Vicky Adin
